name: BinaryConversion
0:
”Alexa, open Binary Conversion”
”Alexa, ask Binary Conversion to convert the number ten”
”Alexa, ask Binary Conversion, what is the binary for five”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: binary conversion
des: Ask alexa to convert a number into it's binary quivalent, and alexa will read back the sequence of 1's and 0's back to you. You can ask "what is the binary of 16?" and alexa will read back "The binary for 16 is 1, 0, 0, 0, 0"
